trans-unit.source: Provides methods and properties for all activity designers that display parallel vertical layouts on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos e propriedades para todos os designers de atividade que exibem layouts vertical paralelos em uma superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] An activity designer that displays a parallel vertical layout represents an activity on the workflow design surface that has two code paths that a workflow can follow.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Um designer de atividade que exibe um layout vertical paralelo representa uma atividade na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho que tem dois caminhos de código que pode seguir um fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: For example, the designer used for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> activity displays the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> activity on the workflow design surface and has a parallel vertical layout.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o designer usado para o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity>atividade exibe o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity>atividade no fluxo de trabalho superfície de design e tem um layout vertical parallel.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity>

trans-unit.source: Each branch of the parallel layout visually represents an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> activity contained in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: Cada ramificação do layout paralela representa visualmente um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity>atividades contidas o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity>atividade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether child activities of the activity associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref> can be moved.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se atividades filho da atividade associada com o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"> </xref> podem ser movidos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that describes the location to move the activities to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> que descreve o local para onde mover as atividades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> read-only collection that contains the activities to move.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> coleção somente leitura que contém as atividades para mover.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the activities can be moved from the parent activity; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as atividades podem ser movidas da atividade pai; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether child activities of the activity associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref> can be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se atividades filho da atividade associada com o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"> </xref> pode ser excluído.

trans-unit.source: The read-only collection of activities to remove.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de atividades para remover somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the activities can be deleted from the parent activity; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as atividades podem ser excluídas da atividade pai; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o primeiro objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the designer's <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> property or the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> property is set to `false`, FirstSelectableObject returns a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Se o designer <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A>propriedade ou o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A>está definida como `false`, FirstSelectableObject retorna uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic).</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> property count is greater than 0, FirstSelectableObject returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the first activity designer in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>propriedade count é maior que 0, FirstSelectableObject retorna o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>associada com o designer de atividade primeiro na coleção.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that is the first selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que é o primeiro objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do designer.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns array of rectangles that represent the valid drop locations within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Matriz retorna dos retângulos que representam os locais de destino válido dentro do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that defines the x- and y-coordinates for the drop target.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que define as coordenadas x e y para o local de destino.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> array that represents the valid drop locations within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> matriz que representa os locais de destino válido dentro do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o primeiro objeto selecionável que segue o objeto especificado na ordem de navegação do atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref:System.Object> in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Atual <xref:System.Object>na ordem de navegação.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"></xref> enumeration value that determines the navigation order of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"> </xref> valor de enumeração que determina a ordem da navegação do designer.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that follows the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que segue o objeto especificado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o último objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the designer's <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> property is set to `false`, LastSelectableObject returns a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Se o designer <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A>ou <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A>está definida como `false`, LastSelectableObject retorna uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic).</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> contains child activity designers, LastSelectableObject returns the last selectable object associated with the first child activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner>contém designers de atividade filho, LastSelectableObject retorna o último objeto selecionável associado com o designer de atividade filho primeiro.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If the child activity designer is collapsed, LastSelectableObject returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the first activity designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se o designer de atividade filho é recolhido, LastSelectableObject retorna o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>associada com o designer de atividade primeiro no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>que é o último objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do designer.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the user has created a new branch activity on the activity associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Indica que o usuário tiver criado uma nova atividade de ramificação na atividade associada com o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> that was added as the new branch of the activity associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"> </xref> que foi adicionado como o novo branch da atividade associada com o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Executa tarefas de layout para posicionar indicações visuais e designers de filho no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os argumentos de layout.

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: econtém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the visual cues on the designers contained within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define o tamanho das indicações visuais sobre os designers de dentro do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os argumentos de layout.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that contains the new size settings for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que contém as novas configurações de tamanho para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Draws the visual representation of the activity associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a representação visual da atividade associada com o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"> </xref> em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the drawing arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os argumentos de desenho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of designer verbs to be associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de verbos do designer deve ser associado a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Verbs property determines the commands that are displayed on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> context menu.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade verbos determina os comandos que são exibidos no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner>menu de contexto.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The verb collection includes any designer verbs <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> inherits from the designer classes it extends.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de verbo inclui qualquer verbos do designer <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner>herda das classes designers ele estende.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerbCollection"></xref> that contains the designer verbs to associate with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerbCollection"> </xref> que contém os verbos do designer para associar o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner"> </xref>.
